declarationSection.title: Submit form to register the business for Fuel Duty

fields.infoText: By submitting this form you are confirming that all the information you’ve provided is correct and complete.

fields.label: whatNext
fields.infoText:
We will review your form.

You'll also need to complete the following steps to complete your registration.

##If the business is Excise Payment Security System (EPSS) approved
You must complete a  [VAT: deferment schedule - SIVA reduced security (SIVA2) form (opens in a new window)](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/vat-deferment-schedule-simplified-import-vat-accounting-reduced-security-siva2). You must send the completed SIVA2 form as well as a copy of your EPSS approval letter to HMRC.

##If you’re not EPSS approved
You’ll need to appoint a guarantor and complete a [Guarantee deferment of payment to HMRC (C1201HO) form (opens in a new window)](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/import-and-export-guarantee-deferment-of-payment-to-hmrc-c1201) and send it to HMRC. 

##How to set up a Direct Debit for your return payments 
You’ll also need to complete a [Set up a Direct Debit to pay deferred duty on imports and excise goods (C1202) form (opens in a new window)](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/import-and-export-duty-deferment-payment-instruction-payment-by-direct-debit-c1202) for your return payments and send it to HMRC.

comments.text: Added 'You'll need to complete the following steps to complete your registration.' to inform users they have to complete all the following to complete their registration.
comments.author: None
